00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import roslib
00004 import sys
00005 import rospy
00006 import geomag
00007 
00008 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3, Vector3Stamped
00009 import numpy as np
00010 from uav_utils import getMag, ThermalRise
00011 from mathutils import saturation, quat2Reb, Vector2Array, quat2euler
00012 from math import floor, exp, atan2, pi
00013 from last_letter.msg import SimStates, SimSensor3, Environment
00014 
00015 _grav=9.81
00016 
00017 #######################  Magnetometer Class  #####################################################
00018 
00019 class Magnetometer():
00020         def __init__(self,name):
00021                 
00022                 rospy.loginfo('Create ' + name +' Sensor')
00023                 
00024                 self.dt = 1.0/rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0)
00025                 self.rate =  rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param(name+'/rate', 100.0))
00026                 rospy.loginfo("\ta.rate: %.1f Hz",1.0/self.dt)
00027 
00028                 self.cp =  np.array(rospy.get_param(name+'/CP', [0.0, 0.0, 0.0])).reshape(3,1)
00029                 rospy.loginfo("\tb.position: [%.2f,%.2f,%.2f]", self.cp[0],self.cp[1],self.cp[2])
00030 
00031                 self.precision = rospy.get_param(name+'/precision', 0.0001)
00032                 rospy.loginfo("\tc.precision: %.1e g",self.precision)
00033 
00034                 self.std_coeff = rospy.get_param(name+'/std_coeff', 0.1)
00035                 rospy.loginfo("\td.noise coeff: %.3f",self.std_coeff)
00036 
00037                 #Noise Characteristics
00038                 self.bs = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleBias', 0.03)/3,3)
00039                 self.ks = np.random.normal(0,rospy.get_param(name+'/scaleThermal', 0.002)/3,3)
00040                 self.bias=Vector3()
00041                 self.randomwalk=Vector3()
00042                 self.scale = Vector3()
00043                 
00044                 self.measurement = SimSensor3()
00045                 self.temp=25.0
00046 
00047                 self.pub = rospy.Publisher(name, SimSensor3)
00048                 self.states_sub = rospy.Subscriber("states",SimStates,self.StatesCallback)
00049                 self.atm_sub = rospy.Subscriber("environment",Environment,self.EnvironmentCallback)
00050 
00051                 self.real=SimStates()
00052                 self.realnew=False
00053                 
00054                 #Thermal Chracteristics
00055                 self.thermalMass = ThermalRise(name)
00056                 rospy.loginfo("\te.Loading Thermal Chracteristics")
00057                 self.airspeed = 0.0
00058 
00059         def iterate(self,states):
00060 
00061                 Reb = quat2Reb(states.pose.orientation)
00062                 Mb,dec=getMag(states.geoid.latitude,states.geoid.longitude,states.geoid.altitude,Reb)
00063 
00064                 nm_noise = np.random.normal(0,self.std_coeff,3)
00065                 
00066                 self.scale.x = self.bs[0] + self.ks[0] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00067                 self.scale.y = self.bs[1] + self.ks[1] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00068                 self.scale.z = self.bs[2] + self.ks[2] * (self.temp - 298.15)
00069 
00070                 self.measurement.axis.x=(1+self.scale.x)*Mb.x+nm_noise[0]
00071                 self.measurement.axis.y=(1+self.scale.y)*Mb.y+nm_noise[1]
00072                 self.measurement.axis.z=(1+self.scale.z)*Mb.z+nm_noise[2]
00073 
00074                 self.measurement.axis.x = floor(self.measurement.axis.x/self.precision)*self.precision
00075                 self.measurement.axis.y = floor(self.measurement.axis.y/self.precision)*self.precision
00076                 self.measurement.axis.z = floor(self.measurement.axis.z/self.precision)*self.precision
00077 
00078                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp
00079                 
00080                 self.tempOffset = self.thermalMass.step(self.airspeed,self.dt)
00081                 self.measurement.temperature = self.temp + self.tempOffset
00082 
00083 
00084         def StatesCallback(self,data):
00085                 self.real=data
00086                 self.realnew=True
00087 
00088         def EnvironmentCallback(self,data):
00089                 self.temp=data.temperature
00090                 if self.realnew:
00091                         self.airspeed = np.sqrt(pow(self.real.velocity.linear.x - data.wind.x,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.y - data.wind.y,2) + pow(self.real.velocity.linear.z - data.wind.z,2))
00092                         
00093 
00094 ###################################################################################################     
00095 #######################  Main Program  ############################################################
00096 ###################################################################################################     
00097 if __name__ == '__main__':
00098         rospy.init_node('acc_model')
00099 
00100         fullname = rospy.get_name().split('/')
00101         mag = Magnetometer(fullname[-1])
00102 
00103         while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00104                 if mag.realnew:
00105                         mag.realnew=False
00106                         mag.iterate(mag.real)
00107                         mag.measurement.header.stamp=rospy.Time.now()
00108                 mag.pub.publish(mag.measurement)
00109                 mag.rate.sleep()
